item.title: Right Click Menu in QTable
item.description: How to get a right click menu from a QTable in PyQt To be able to have a right click menu in a QTable (PyQt), you need to follow the following few steps Turn on Custom Context Menu In QtDesigner, and in the property editor select in the contextMenuPolicy the option CustomContextMenu. Connect Custom Context Menu Signal Catch Signal in Main Code ... def h3_table_right_click(self, position): o_h3_table = H3TableHandler(parent=self) o_h3_table.
